Description: Book of the Dead; frame 6 (two fragments); red and black ink; full colour vignettes; red and yellow border.
Curator's comments: See B. Luescher, Totenbuch-papyrus Neuchatel Eg. 429 und Princeton Pharaonic Roll 2 (BAA 1, Basel 2007), 16.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134355) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134355)
